attributes.action: Consider allowing children to repeat the school year.
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to consider adapting the British education system so that children who are not achieving at the level they should are able to repeat their school year.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to consider allowing children across primary and secondary schools to repeat the year. The majority of children are suffering massively with this pandemic and the gaps being attainment in children is widening.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
